text:
Oscar Rizzato (28 February 1928 – 11 January 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1954. He was created titular bishop of "Virunum" from 1989 until his death. He was born in Veneto, Italy.
Rizzato died on January 11, 2021 in Padua, Italy from problems caused by COVID-19, at the age of 91.
